moveTo

public ChessPiece moveTo(Location loc)
                  throws IllegalMoveException,
                         PieceNeedsToBeReplacedException
Moves this ChessPiece to a new location. If there is another ChessPiece at the given location, it is removed.
Precondition: (1) This ChessPiece is contained in a ChessBoard (2) newLocation is valid in the ChessBoard of this ChessPiece Postcondition: (1) If a piece was contained at loc, that piece was removed from the ChessBoard

Parameters:
newLocation - the new location
Returns:
true if this Chess Piece moved, false if it did not
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the location was not valid move location for the piece
IllegalMoveException
PieceNeedsToBeReplacedException

putSelfInChessBoard

public void putSelfInChessBoard(ChessBoard<ChessPiece> br,
                                Location loc)
Puts this ChessPiece into a ChessBoard. If there is another ChessPiece at the given location, it is removed.
Precondition: (1) This ChessPiece is not contained in a ChessBoard (2) loc is valid in br

Parameters:
br - the ChessBoard into which this ChessPiece should be placed
loc - the location into which the ChessPiece should be placed

removeSelfFromChessBoard

public void removeSelfFromChessBoard()
Removes this ChessPiece from its ChessBoard.
Precondition: This ChessPiece is contained in a ChessBoard
